TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InertiaExpansionBehavior extends System.Object

summary.span: 控制惯性运动期间大小调整操作的减速度。

span.span: Controls the deceleration of a resizing manipulation during inertia.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类指定延迟时，扩展操作的行为方式。The class specifies how a expansion manipulation behaves when it is inertia. 使用中的属性事件来执行以下操作：Use the property in the event to do the following: - 通过设置开始时指定惯性的初始速度属性。Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the property. - 指定的操作所需的扩展，通过设置惯性结束时属性。Specify the desired expansion of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the property. - 通过设置指定所需的减速的惯性属性。Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the property. 设置或，但不是两者。Set either the or the , but not both. 当你设置这些属性之一时，其他属性将更改为如果它的值。When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to if it has a value. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件处理程序和设置需要的减速转换、 扩展以及在惯性过程中使用的旋转。The following example shows the event handler and sets the desired deceleration for translation, expansion, and rotation that is used during inertia. 此示例摘自在更大的示例[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ManipulationInertiaStarting](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#manipulationinertiastarting)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ManipulationInertiaStarting](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#manipulationinertiastarting)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double DesiredDeceleration { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置大小调整减慢的速率（[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]/平方毫秒）。

span.span: Gets or sets the rate that resizing slows in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] per square milliseconds.

value.span: 大小调整减慢的速率（[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]/平方毫秒）。

span.span: The rate that resizing slows in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] per square milliseconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定所需的减速的惯性。Use the property to specify the desired deceleration of the inertia. 设置或，但不是两者。Set either the or the , but not both. 当你设置这些属性之一时，其他属性将更改为如果它的值。When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to if it has a value. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

span.span: The property is set to infinity.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Vector DesiredExpansion { System::Windows::Vector get(); void set(System::Windows::Vector value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置惯性结束时元素调整的量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount the element resizes at the end of inertia.

value.span: 惯性结束时元素调整的量。

span.span: The amount the element resizes at the end of inertia.

value.span: 默认是将 和 属性设置为 的 。

span.span: The default is a that has its and properties set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性惯性结束时指定所需操作扩展。Use the property to specify the desired expansion of the manipulation when inertia ends. 设置或，但不是两者。Set either the or the , but not both. 当你设置这些属性之一时，其他属性将更改为如果它的值。When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to if it has a value. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
